home.title: Welcome to My Nuxt App
home.overviewText: This application is a client-side rendered Nuxt 3 app that demonstrates a complete sign-up flow with modern UI components and features.
home.featureSignUp: User registration with email and password
home.featureDuplicateCheck: Duplicate email detection using local storage
home.featureDynamicTheming: Dynamic theme switching between light and dark modes
home.featureResponsiveLayout: Responsive global layout with a persistent navigation sidebar and top bar
home.nordDescription: The app uses the Nordhealth Cloud Design System to ensure a consistent and modern UI. Key components include:
home.nordInput: Nordhealth Input for form fields (email, password)
home.nordButton: Nordhealth Button for actions (submit, toggle password)
home.nordTopBar: Nordhealth Top Bar for header and theme switching
home.techNuxt: Nuxt 3 for routing and application structure
home.techVeeValidate: VeeValidate and Yup for form validation
home.techDynamicTheming: Dynamic theming using external stylesheet switching

form.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
